text: The church interior is so beautiful and a good tradition feel .. m so blessed to be to have my wedding ceremony there . Thank you Pastor Leroy who was there throughout rendering his assistance. GOD BLESS üôè
A historical church in Singapore which is just opposite CHIJMES in City Hall area. Restricted ground and only open for masses whenever there is servicea.
This place is great for people looking for the ultimate meaning in life. The people here are caring and loving to even strangers.
Nice Anglican Church for prayer, very friendly and relaxing
